Reviews.Title: It's a cheap phone with problems
Reviews.Author: Michael J.
Reviews.Content: It's a nice phone if it works.  The main problem I have run into is the touch screen does not work after 2-3 months into it on top of a dimmed screen light and not disconnecting calls.  I have contacted the seller, emailed them back and forth on the problems with no help at all. Finally, they asked me to seek a local help on this phone and now I am stuck with an unfunctional phone. Not cool at all.  I would not recommand anyone to buy from this vendor at all.

Reviews.Title: Its a good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Just_ an_average_customer
Reviews.Content: The phone is well made. The screen doesn't lag when you swipe. The only reason why i gave the phone a 4 star raiting was because when i got the phone and opened it, i saw a slot that had a s-pen (if that's what it's called). When i took it out and tried to use it on the screen it wasn't working. So i realized that it was fake. Which really upsetted me. Another reason why i gave it a four star raiting was that in the description it said that the phone had a 8mp camera. When i checked the camera out it was HORRIBLE. Every thing was horrible and the picture didn't come out good. The front facing camera is just as bad. If you want a phone that will take amazing pictures this might not be one of your choices.PROS-----------Big screen good for watching moviesLoud volumeFast wifiCONS----------Horrible cameraFake s penHard to find casses** I bought a galaxy note 2 case for this phone and it actually fit really good**

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: cactus
Reviews.Content: I am fully satisfied. Wi-Fi is really fast. And its highly sensitive touchscreen is awesome. I recommend to buy it if any body iz looking for good phone in reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Good one!!!
Reviews.Author: gopinath
Reviews.Content: This Phone looks same as Note 2.Works great. Good phone for this price.Only drawback i saw was battery backup. Not sure for 2 days.I connected it to wifi network. Internet works amazing!

Reviews.Title: sorry as hell
Reviews.Author: doc
Reviews.Content: It will not work on net 10 or any other network for that matter it's nothing but a paper weight

Reviews.Title: Battery issues
Reviews.Author: Li C Shih
Reviews.Content: They have battery problems, the battery wouldn't get charge, they send two of them, but one is died already, I don't know the other one how long will less? I just got the phone 3 days ago, I really have no idea, that is a good buy or not.

Reviews.Title: Signal reception not working at all
Reviews.Author: DIANA suwansaeng
Reviews.Content: I have a little problem with this android phone i have checked for about a week it has bad signal reception it doesnt let dial numbers or received numbers at all can u let me know what to do i love this phone very much internet works good on the phone just the phone signal reception can u email me something showing me step by step what to do thanks. Again for your business. Diana suwansaeng. From chicago il
